message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. While I understand your perspective, I'm confident this product is worth more than that. How about we settle at $13,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still not convinced the product is worth $13,000. I would like to stick to my original offer of $12,000. If you're unable to meet this price, I'll consider purchasing the product from John.
